name: S.Q.U.I.D. Arena
description:
Welcome  to  the  Superior  Quality  Unified  Imperialist  Dominion!  You  have  been  selected  to  demonstrate  the  shortcomings  of  human  anatomy  in  the  S.Q.U.I.D.  Arena.  Thank  you  for  your  obedient  servitude.

Controls:

WASD:  Move     

Mouse:  Aim

L. Click:  Shoot

R: Toggle Auto-Fire

SPACE: Dodge roll (Finish Squid)

This game was Completed by a team of 3 for the ScoreSpace Jam #13.
Code by Breakfish
Art by Marcklopp and Breakfish
Music by Snerd Burfle 

the only assets used in this game that were not made during the jam are Two Fonts:

1) Arcade classic font by Jacob Fischer (free for personal use)

https://www.1001fonts.com/arcadeclassic-font.html

2) Karmatic Arcade Font (free for commercial use)

https://www.1001fonts.com/karmatic-arcade-font.html
